input.sentences: the political rally attracted people with very different views .
some with views very extreme are still welcome to express their opinion .
so far | the rally has been relatively peaceful .
but as with all rallies | there 's always an undertone of tension .
even the jollee bee mascot expressed his views .
output.sentences: People came to express their views at a political rally.
Some views and opinions were very extreme.
The understone to these rallies can sometimes have tension.
It helped there was a jollee mascot sharing his views.
